product_name: REI Kids' OTF Water Bottle - 12 fl. oz.
long_description: Sized so young adventurers can port their own water and with a cap that little fingers can easily undo, the REI Nalgene Kids' On The Fly (OTF) water bottle keeps kids hydrated and having fun. BPA-free plastic lets the taste of the beverage come through without any plastic aftertaste. Flip-top lid is easy to open and close with 1 hand while remaining leakproof; wide mouth opening is easy to drink from and accommodates ice cubes. REI Nalgene Kids' OTF water bottle fits in cup holders and bike bottle cages.
short_description: Sized so young adventurers can port their own water and with a cap that little fingers can easily undo, the REI Nalgene Kids' On The Fly (OTF) water bottle keeps kids hydrated and having fun.
